sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Israeli police have stormed the Al-Asqa Mosque in Old Jerusalem for the second night in a row, sparking international outrage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's President Zelensky and his Polish counterpart show united front in Warsaw, while Russian President Putin welcomes 17 new ambassadors to Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: France's Emmanuel Macron and the EU president continue talks in China to strengthen relations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Israeli police have raided the Laksa Mosque in Old Jerusalem for the second night in a row,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: renewing violence in the West Bank and Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The Palestinian Red Crescent says at least six Palestinians have been injured in the raid. Just the day before, images of Israeli police storming the mosque and showing them beating and removing 350 worshippers sparked outrage. This is just one that went viral.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Officers say they were trying to remove young people who had barricaded themselves inside the mosque and threw rocks and other objects at them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Members of the Arab League later gathered for an emergency meeting in Cairo, condemning the police raid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: UN chief Antonio Guterres said he was shocked and appalled. People gathered for protests in the Gaza Strip and West Bank, and several rockets were fired towards Israel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Such confrontations have in the past sparked deadly cross-border wars between Israel and Hamas. Around 110 people have died since the beginning of the year in the region, including around 90 Palestinians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: French President Emmanuel Macron has begun talks with his Chinese counterpart in Beijing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Top of their agenda, the war in Ukraine and the troubled relations between China and the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Alluding to the close ties between Xi Jinping and Russian President Vladimir Putin, Macron says he hopes China will play a greater role in finding a peaceful solution to the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: He is joined by EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen, who will also begin talks with China's president later today.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Euronews correspondent Anna Lazaro tiene más de Beijing. Es vista como un reconocimiento al papel preponderante que China quiere jugar en el nuevo orden internacional que se está estableciendo especialmente después de que empezara la guerra en Ucrania Pero también hay un cierto resquemor ya que tienen la sensación de que Europa les quiere obligar a tomar partido contra Rusia Y para Pekín es importante mantener no solo la neutralidad, también la amistad con Rusia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: El primer ministro chino ha pedido reconocimiento mutuo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: En cuanto a Europa, el objetivo es evitar que China envíe armas letales a Rusia y la presidenta de la Comisión Europea ha dicho que es importante poder hablar sobre todos los temas en este contexto internacional tan volátil y también ante unas relaciones entre la Unión Europea y China que son cada vez más complejas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ana Lázaro, Euronews, Pekín.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We stand together. Polish and Ukrainian presidents pressed home this message at an evening ceremony at Warsaw's Royal Castle in the capital's old town.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Since Russia launched its full-scale invasion, Kiev and Warsaw have forged a tighter relationship, with Poland leading the charge and persuading allies to provide Ukraine with heavy weaponry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: During this state visit, Polish President Andrzej Duda announced his country will supply Ukraine with a total of 14 Soviet-designed MiG-29 fighter jets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky delighted the crowds by speaking in Polish. Poland, great Polish people, great Ukrainian people, together we unite on this square in the spirit of freedom, great history and glorious victory that we are approaching together.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In Moscow, Russian President Vladimir Putin has accepted diplomatic credentials from 17 new ambassadors to Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: During the ceremony, Putin recognized that U.S.-Russian relations were in, quote, deep crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Later, Putin chaired Russia Security Council during which he claimed that members of Western security services are helping Ukraine commit terrorist acts in Russia Finland's blue and white flag has been flying at the

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: NATO headquarters since Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But opposition from both Turkey and Hungary keeps another Nordic country, Sweden, in the waiting room.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hungary's foreign minister, Peter Sijarto, who attended the NATO ministerial meeting in Brussels, said that putting pressure on Hungary will not bring any results.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He insisted the decision is purely in the hands of the national parliament where many legislators are denouncing Swedish criticism towards urban government. Ha a magyar politikai rendszer nem demokratikus, nem legitim, diktatúra, akkor ők jogosan érzékenyek erre, mert ők demokratikus választáson, demokratikus módon, az emberekkel való kapcsolattartás alapján szerezték a mandátumokat. China centered most of the discussion at the second day of meetings at NATO headquarters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Allies examined China's growing alignment with Russia, following Chinese President Xi Jinping's visit to Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The main concern is about the possibility of China supplying arms to Russia, something Beijing denies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: China refuses to condemn Russia's aggression.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It echoes Russian propaganda and it props up Russia's economy. Kina forfølger å fordømme Russias aggressivitet, det krever russisk propaganda og det forfølger Russias økonomi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Kina og Russia støtter også opp deres samarbeid i Indopasifikasjonen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Allier har vært klare at hver provisjon av letal hjelp av Kina til Russia, skulle være en historisk fordømil med profonde implikasjoner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Diskussjonen tok plass i tider før presidenten av kommisjonen på Frankrike møtte president Xi i Beijing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: USA-sekretæren Anthony Blinken sa i Euronews at han er sikker på

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: at Sverige vil samle NATO før Ville-Ny-Summet i sommer, The U.S. Secretary of State, Antony Blinken, told Euronews that he is confident that Sweden will join NATO before the Vilnius summit this summer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: For it to happen, two remaining allies, Turkey and Hungary, will have to ratify the enlargement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Blinken spoke in an exclusive interview to Euronews after the NATO foreign affairs meeting in Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Or is it a lost case?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Virtually every NATO country has already ratified Sweden's membership.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Turkey and Hungary have not yet, but based on everything I heard, including virtually every ally in the meetings that we had just today and yesterday, calling for Sweden to join Finland as soon as possible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And I think with the leaders summit coming up in Vilnius, again, I would anticipate that that process will be complete by then.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Blinken said China needs to put pressure on Russia to end the war and to respect Ukraine's territorial integrity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He added Washington supports a European Commission's approach towards China, which concentrates on the risking instead of decoupling.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On the tensions around Taiwan, Blinken said they are not aiming for confrontation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We have been very clear that we do not want, we do not seek conflict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We're not trying to contain China.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We on the contrary want to preserve peace, stability, create opportunity. When it comes to Taiwan, our policy has been consistent for decades. Any differences between mainland China and Taiwan need to be resolved peacefully. Neither side should do anything to disrupt the status quo, not take any unilateral actions that would do that.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: AMBASSADOR HA that. Is anything changing now?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: That is up to Beijing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: From our perspective, and I think the perspective, and I heard this in conversations with many of our NATO allies as well as partners in Asia, there is concern that were there to be a crisis as a result of China's actions over over Taiwan that would have repercussions for quite literally every country on earth. 50% of commercial traffic, 50% of global commercial traffic goes through the Taiwan Strait every day. 70% of the semiconductors that we need for our smartphones, for our dishwashers, for our cars, they're made on Taiwan. If there was some kind of crisis as a result of something that China did, that would have terribly disruptive effects on the global economy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The full interview will be on air on Eur-feira, às 15h até 9h.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Um silêncio de uma minuta para as vítimas de um ataque de descanso no Brasil.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Quatro crianças foram mortas por um homem com um hatchet em terça-feira.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Um indivíduo chamado Luiz Henrique de Lima tem 25 anos de idade e é natural de Salto do Lontra, estado do Paraná, mas desde 2009 já possui carteira de identidade aqui no estado de Santa Catarina.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Ele possui pelo menos quatro passagens policiais. killed in a playground at the Can Chin Ho Bom Pastor Nursery in the city of Blumenau. They're thought to have been aged between four and seven years old.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Five more were injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In total, around 40 children had been inside the main building when the attacker jumped over a wall and burst into the centre.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The assailant later turned himself in to the police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The state governor has declared three days of mourning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Former Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: has been admitted to hospital in Milan, where he's expected to spend the night.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He's in stable condition, he's a rock, his brother told reporters after a visit to the hospital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But in recent years, Mr Berlusconi, who served as prime minister three times, has been in poor health.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He's undergone heart surgery and battled prostate cancer and made frequent hospital visits after contracting COVID-19.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: His most recent hospital stay ended just a few days ago.
